title: 12/23/2020 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 12/23/2020 - Best of The Herd
description:
Doug Gottlieb in for Colin


-Don't write off the Clippers yet, they can beat the Lakers

-James Harden is pulling a Costanza

-The Steelers are exactly what the Packers are trying to avoid 

-The Warriors are done and it's not because of Klay Thompson's injury


Guest: Chris Mannix, Sports Illustrated

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
